strings.string: Device ID - The chosen device ID retrieved from your device access project. Make sure you identify the device ID of your Nest Thermostat.
Filled in by in application selection.
OAuth Code - OAuth2 Authorisation Code for your Google Nest SDM API project.
Authorisation Tokens - The application manages these, but visibility is provided here.
Access Token - OAuth2 Authorisation Access Token for your Google Nest SDM API project. Derived from OAuth Code and lasts 1 hour.
Access Token Expire - A UTC time value for when the access token expires.
Refresh Token - OAuth2 Authorisation Refresh Token for your Google Nest SDM API project. Used to refresh the access token once it has expired.
